underbent-sample:
//Item Display Configuration
Advanced Item Display: True, None
ItemDisplay[tsc]: %GREEN%**%WHITE%TP
ItemDisplay[isc]: %GREEN%**%WHITE%ID
ItemDisplay[vps]: Stam
ItemDisplay[yps]: Anti
ItemDisplay[wms]: Thaw
ItemDisplay[gps]:
ItemDisplay[ops]:
ItemDisplay[gpm]:
ItemDisplay[opm]:
ItemDisplay[gpl]:
ItemDisplay[opl]:
ItemDisplay[hp1]: %RED%**%WHITE%Min Heal
ItemDisplay[hp2]: %RED%**%WHITE%Lt Heal
ItemDisplay[hp3]: %RED%**%WHITE%Heal
ItemDisplay[hp4]: %RED%**%WHITE%Gt Heal
ItemDisplay[hp5]: %RED%**%WHITE%Sup Heal
ItemDisplay[mp1]: %BLUE%**%WHITE%Min Mana
ItemDisplay[mp2]: %BLUE%**%WHITE%Lt Mana
ItemDisplay[mp3]: %BLUE%**%WHITE%Mana
ItemDisplay[mp4]: %BLUE%**%WHITE%Gt Mana
ItemDisplay[mp5]: %BLUE%**%WHITE%Sup Mana
ItemDisplay[rvs]: %PURPLE%**%WHITE%Rejuv
ItemDisplay[rvl]: %PURPLE%**%WHITE%Full
ItemDisplay[aqv]: Arrows
ItemDisplay[cqv]: Bolts
ItemDisplay[key]: Key
ItemDisplay[tes]: Andy*Duriel Essence
ItemDisplay[ceh]: Mephisto Essence
ItemDisplay[bet]: Diablo Essence
ItemDisplay[fed]: Baal Essence

// Ignore all inferior items
ItemDisplay[INF]:

// Runes and gems
ItemDisplay[RUNE<20]: %RUNENUM% - %RUNENAME%
ItemDisplay[RUNE>19]: %PURPLE%%RUNENUM% - %RUNENAME%%MAP%
ItemDisplay[GEM>3]: %PURPLE%%NAME%

// Add ethereality, sockets, ilvl to the name
ItemDisplay[ETH]: Eth %NAME%%CONTINUE%
ItemDisplay[SOCK>0]: %NAME% (%SOCKETS%)%CONTINUE%
ItemDisplay[]: %NAME% L%ILVL%%CONTINUE%

// Polearms
ItemDisplay[WP8 ETH ELT NMAG (SOCK=0 OR SOCK>3) !7o7]: %PURPLE%%NAME%

// Body armor
ItemDisplay[EQ2 ELT ETH NMAG !SUP SOCK=0]: %PURPLE%%NAME%
ItemDisplay[uui !ETH NMAG !SOCK=1 !SOCK=2 DEF>450]: %PURPLE%%NAME%
ItemDisplay[utp !ETH NMAG !SOCK=1 !SOCK=2 DEF>505]: %PURPLE%%NAME%
ItemDisplay[xtp !ETH NMAG !SOCK=1 !SOCK=2 DEF>254]: %PURPLE%%NAME%
ItemDisplay[xtp !ETH NMAG ED>13]: %PURPLE%%NAME%

// Paladin shields
ItemDisplay[CL3 ELT ETH NMAG RES>29 SOCK=0]: %PURPLE%%NAME%
ItemDisplay[CL3 ELT !ETH NMAG RES>39 !SOCK=1 !SOCK=2]: %PURPLE%%NAME%

// Barb helms with +3 BO
ItemDisplay[CL2 ((ILVL>25 SOCK=0) OR SOCK=3) NMAG SK149>2]: %PURPLE%%NAME%

// Druid pelts with +3 tornado
ItemDisplay[CL1 ((ILVL>25 SOCK=0) OR SOCK=3) NMAG SK245>2]: %PURPLE%%NAME%

// Wands with BS/BS capable of 2os
ItemDisplay[WP12 !wnd !9wn !ywn NMAG !SOCK=1 SK84>1 SK93>1]: %PURPLE%%NAME%

// Leaf/memory bases
ItemDisplay[WP11 NMAG (SOCK=0 OR SOCK=2) SK52>2]: %PURPLE%%NAME%
ItemDisplay[WP11 NMAG (SOCK=0 OR SOCK=4) SK58>2]: %PURPLE%%NAME%

// Grand matron bows
ItemDisplay[amc ((SOCK=0 !SUP) OR SOCK=4) NMAG CLSK0=3]: %PURPLE%%NAME%

// Monarch shields
ItemDisplay[uit (SOCK=0 OR SOCK=4) NMAG DEF>145]: %PURPLE%%NAME%

Show Missiles:          True, None

AutomapInfo[3]:         %LEVEL%
AutomapInfo[4]:         %GAMEDIFF%

//Character Configuration

Color Mod:              False, None
Shorten Item Names:     False, None

Display Messages:       True, None

Draw Path:              True, None
Draw Destination:       True, None
CP to cave:             False, None

Path Color:             97
Next Color:             0x97
Other Color:            0x0A
WP Color:               0x84
Prev Color:             0x5B

// Use Healing Potion:     False, VK_V
// Use Mana Potion:        False, VK_G


//Item Display Configuration

//IDN adds a text warning when an item marked with a box on the map drops. Requires AID (Advanced Item Display).
Item Drop Notifications: True, None

//Add in your custom additions here, so they are easy to copy and paste to a different file.

ItemDisplay[NMAG !INF CLVL<40 SOCK=2 (cap OR skp OR hlm OR fhl OR msk OR bhm) !RW]: %ORANGE%Lore %GRAY%%NAME%                        //Labels Lore bases for CLVL<70
ItemDisplay[NMAG !INF CLVL<30 (qui OR lea OR hla OR stu OR brs) SOCK=2 !RW]: %ORANGE%Stealth %GRAY%%NAME%                            //Labels Stealth bases for CLVL<30
ItemDisplay[NMAG !INF CLVL<60 (buc OR sml OR lrg OR bsh OR spk OR xsh) SOCK=2 !RW]: %ORANGE%Rhyme/Splendor %GRAY%%NAME%                     //Labels Rhyme/Splendor bases for CLVL<60
ItemDisplay[NMAG !INF SOCK=0 ILVL>25 (bsd OR lsd) CLVL<61]: %ORANGE%Larzuk gives 4s %WHITE%%NAME%                                    //Labels Larzukable swords for Spirit for CLVL<60
ItemDisplay[NMAG !INF SOCK=3 msk CLVL<60]: %NAME%                                                                                    //Label for a 3 socket Mask for CLVL<61
ItemDisplay[NMAG !INF SOCK=3 lrg CLVL<60]: %NAME%                                                                                    //Label for a 3 socket Large Shield
ItemDisplay[NMAG !INF ETH (SOCK=4 OR SOCK=0) vou CLVL<60]: %NAME%                                                                    //Label for a 0/4 socket Voulge
ItemDisplay[NMAG !INF SOCK=2 xsh CLVL<60]: %NAME%                                                                                    //Label for a 2 socket Grim Shield
ItemDisplay[NMAG WP8 !ELT ETH SOCK=4 !RW CLVL<61] :%ORANGE%Insight%GRAY%%NAME%%MAP-1F%%BORDER-00%%NOTIFY-5%                          //Label for 4s ethereal polearms + ping until CLVL60
ItemDisplay[MAG (wnd OR ywn OR bwn OR gwn OR sst OR lst OR cst OR bst OR wst OR ne1 OR ne2 OR ne3 OR ne4 OR ne5) CLVL<25]: %NAME%    //Progressive filter for wands

MISC STUFF
_________________________________________________________________________________________________________________


// Fap's minimal Config (Thanks Fap, useful stuff)

//Custom display for gems (Shorthens name and add matching rune number for cube transmute recipe)
// Shortens name
ItemDisplay[GEM=1]: Chipped%CONTINUE%
ItemDisplay[GEM=2]: Flawed%CONTINUE%
ItemDisplay[GEM=3]: Normal%CONTINUE%
//Flawless gems (non-skull) : Color name orange
ItemDisplay[GEM=4]: Flawless%CONTINUE%
ItemDisplay[(GEM=4 AND !GEMTYPE=7)]: %ORANGE%Flawless%CONTINUE%
ItemDisplay[GEM=5]: Perfect%CONTINUE%

//Color specific pings for flawless gems (small map ping of the gem's color)
ItemDisplay[GEM=4 GEMTYPE=1]: %NAME%%MAP-9B%%CONTINUE%      //Amethysts
//ItemDisplay[GEM=4 GEMTYPE=2]: %NAME%%MAP-20%%CONTINUE%      //Diamonds
//ItemDisplay[GEM=4 GEMTYPE=3]: %NAME%%MAP-84%%CONTINUE%      //Emeralds
ItemDisplay[GEM=4 GEMTYPE=4]: %NAME%%MAP-62%%CONTINUE%      //Rubies
//ItemDisplay[GEM=4 GEMTYPE=5]: %NAME%%MAP-97%%CONTINUE%      //Sapphires
//ItemDisplay[GEM=4 GEMTYPE=6]: %NAME%%MAP-A8%%CONTINUE%      //Topazes

// Adds a matching circle (instead of gem type in name)
ItemDisplay[GEMTYPE=1]: %PURPLE%O %WHITE%%NAME%%CONTINUE%
ItemDisplay[GEMTYPE=2]: %WHITE%O %NAME%%CONTINUE%
ItemDisplay[GEMTYPE=3]: %GREEN%O %WHITE%%NAME%%CONTINUE%

ItemDisplay[GEM=1 GEMTYPE=6]: %NAME% - 10 %CONTINUE%
ItemDisplay[GEM=1 GEMTYPE=1]: %NAME% - 11 %CONTINUE%
ItemDisplay[GEM=1 GEMTYPE=5]: %NAME% - 12 %CONTINUE%

ItemDisplay[GEM=3 GEMTYPE=4]: %NAME% - 25 %CONTINUE%

ItemDisplay[GEM=4 GEMTYPE=4]: %NAME% - 31 %CONTINUE%
ItemDisplay[GEM=4 GEMTYPE=3]: %NAME% - 32 %CONTINUE%

//Add ethereality, sockets, ilvl, superiority, weapon speed to the name
ItemDisplay[SUP ED=15 AR=3 !EQ4 !EQ5 !EQ6 !WP12 !WP6 !WP5 !WP4]: [15%][3AR] %NAME% %CONTINUE%
ItemDisplay[SUP ED=15 AR<3 !EQ4 !EQ5 !EQ6 !WP12 !WP6 !WP5 !WP4]: [15%] %NAME% %CONTINUE%

ItemDisplay[SOCK>0]: %NAME% (%SOCKETS%)%CONTINUE%
ItemDisplay[WEAPON !CL6 !WP12]: [+%RANGE% %WPNSPD%] %NAME% %CONTINUE%
//ItemDisplay[!RUNE>0 !GEM>0]: %NAME% [L%ILVL%] %CONTINUE%
ItemDisplay[!RUNE>0 !GEM>0]: %NAME%%CONTINUE% [L%ILVL%] (%PRICE%)


//Shorten item names, ignore junk
ItemDisplay[tsc]: %GREEN%**%WHITE%TP
ItemDisplay[isc]: %GREEN%**%WHITE%ID
ItemDisplay[vps CLVL<12]: %NAME%
ItemDisplay[vps]: //Ignore stamina potions
ItemDisplay[yps]: %GREEN%o %WHITE%Antidote
ItemDisplay[wms]: //Ignore Thawing potion
ItemDisplay[gps]: //Ignore Rancid Gas potion
ItemDisplay[ops]: //Ignore Oil potion
ItemDisplay[gpm]: //Ignore Choking Gas potion
ItemDisplay[opm]: //Ignore Exploding potion
ItemDisplay[gpl]: //Ignore Strangling Gas potion
ItemDisplay[opl]: //Ignore Fulminating potion

//Level based filters. Add double slash // in front of each line you want to disable. This means you'll always see these pots. Minor to Super, HP to Mana.
ItemDisplay[hp1 CLVL>10]: 
ItemDisplay[hp2 CLVL>15]: 
ItemDisplay[hp3 CLVL>20]: 
ItemDisplay[hp4 CLVL>35]: 
//ItemDisplay[hp5 CLVL>79]: 
ItemDisplay[mp1 CLVL>10]: 
ItemDisplay[mp2 CLVL>15]: 
ItemDisplay[mp3 CLVL>25]: 
ItemDisplay[mp4 CLVL>35]: 
//ItemDisplay[mp5 CLVL>70]: //remove these two slashes in front of ItemDisplay on this line to hide super mana pots past level 70
//ItemDisplay[rvs CLVL>60]: //Same, but baby juvs and level 60

ItemDisplay[hp1]: %RED%* H%WHITE%1
ItemDisplay[hp2]: %RED%* H%WHITE%2
ItemDisplay[hp3]: %RED%* H%WHITE%3
ItemDisplay[hp4]: %RED%* H%WHITE%4
ItemDisplay[hp5]: %RED%* H%WHITE%5
ItemDisplay[mp1]: %BLUE%* M%WHITE%1
ItemDisplay[mp2]: %BLUE%* M%WHITE%2
ItemDisplay[mp3]: %BLUE%* M%WHITE%3
ItemDisplay[mp4]: %BLUE%* M%WHITE%4
ItemDisplay[mp5]: %BLUE%* M%WHITE%5
ItemDisplay[rvs]: %PURPLE%Baby JUV
ItemDisplay[rvl]: %PURPLE%JUV
ItemDisplay[aqv]: %WHITE%Shooty Things //add two slashes in front of %WHITE% on this line to hide arrows, like you see for Bolts
ItemDisplay[cqv]: //%WHITE%Bolts
ItemDisplay[key]: Key

//Pings pandemonium keys
ItemDisplay[pk1 OR pk2 OR pk3]: %ORANGE%%NAME%%MAP-20%%BORDER-00%%LINE-9D%%NOTIFY-8%

//Act 2 rush instructions
ItemDisplay[vip OR msf]: %ORANGE%Talk to Drognan before going arcane sanctuary. %TAN%%NAME%

//Ignore small gold stacks, progressive system.
ItemDisplay[CLVL>19 CLVL<40 GOLD<20]:
ItemDisplay[CLVL>39 CLVL<60 GOLD<50]:
ItemDisplay[CLVL>59 CLVL<80 GOLD<1000]:
ItemDisplay[CLVL>79 GOLD<2000]:

//Highest priority so leg is always visible
ItemDisplay[leg]: %ORANGE%%NAME%%MAP%

_________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
RUNE STUFF
_________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

//Pings Rals. Enable by removing double slash. Orange notification text.
ItemDisplay[RUNE=8]: %RUNENUM% - %ORANGE%%RUNENAME%%BORDER-00%%MAP-62%%NOTIFY-8%

//Alters basic display of runes - add drop notification for runes over Fal
//Runes : Runes up to Fal orange. White notif text.
ItemDisplay[RUNE<20]: %RUNENUM% - %ORANGE%%RUNENAME%
ItemDisplay[RUNE=32]: %RUNENUM% - %PURPLE%Subscribe to PewDiePie %BORDER-9B%%MAP-00%%DOT-9B%%PX-9B%%LINE-9B%%NOTIFY-b%        //Adjusts name for Cham to better fit its value

//RUNES : Runes Lem to Gul Red, box on map. Red notif text.
ItemDisplay[(RUNE>19 AND RUNE<26)]: %RUNENUM% - %RED%%RUNENAME%%BORDER-00%%MAP-62%%NOTIFY-1%

//RUNES : Show a purple box on map for rune Vex and higher. Purple notif text.
ItemDisplay[RUNE>25]: %RUNENUM% - %PURPLE%%RUNENAME%%BORDER-9B%%MAP-00%%DOT-9B%%PX-9B%%LINE-9B%%NOTIFY-b%
